    Centroid  
    CollaborativeFiltering
    This class implements the recomendation algorithm collaborative filtering.
    ConjuntItems
    This class represents a set of items in the form of an ArrayList extension.
    ConjuntRecomanacions
    This class describes a set of recommendations as an extenssion of ArrayList of recommendations.
    ConjuntUsuaris
    This class describes a set of users as a extension of a users ArrayList.
    ContentBasedFiltering
    This class implements the recomendation algorithm content based filtering.
    ControladorDomini  
    ControladorDominiAlgorisme
    This class is used to call the algorithm and keep saved its parameters.
    ControladorLoad
    The class ControladorLoad implements the function for loading data from memory.
    ControladorPersistencia
    The class ControladorPersistencia implements the functionalities of writing and reading data from memory.
    ControladorSave
    The class ControladorSave implements the function for storing data in memory.
